articles.author: Claire Parker
articles.title: As some countries welcome Afghan refugees, others are trying to keep them out - The Washington Post
articles.description: Afghan asylum seekers will face fortified border walls, intensified patrols and hostile rhetoric on the route to Europe.
articles.content: Neighboring countries are bracing to bear the brunt of any surge and warning they are not prepared. Asylum seekers who continue on the long and arduous path to Europe will encounter anti-refugee sent… [+8318 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Two Nigerian states try out COVID vaccine passes - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Health passes or vaccine passports, required for entry to places like restaurants, gyms and cinemas, are already in place in some European countries though they have triggered protests in France, Greece and Italy as unfair to the unvaccinated.
articles.content: Health passes or vaccine passports, required for entry to places like restaurants, gyms and cinemas, are already in place in some European countries though they have triggered protests in France, Gre… [+3141 chars]
